p: In an attempt to reduce the FFA of the oil, different acid/methanol volume ratios were used. The acid value and FFA was computed and recorded ( Table 9). The optimum condition obtained for the pre-treatment of 100 ml of oil was established at a CH 3OH/acid volumetric ratio of 1.5 with an acid value of 1.2840 mg KOH g −1, corresponds to FFA of 0.6142 mg KOH g −1 which was used for a successful conversion of oil to biodiesel [ 39, 53].
